package.name: Image_Graph
package.summary: Drawing graphs out of numerical data (traffic, money, ...)
package.description: Features: - drawing graphs in various formats (line, bar, points marked by squares/diamonds/triangles/...) - multiple graphs in one diagram - up to 2 Y-axes - flexible Y-value-output-customisation - variable ticks for the Y-axes - flexible fill-elements - grid-support - alpha-channel-support - ...

release.notes:
- adapted package to new, completely changed API of Image_Text - updated examples due to API-break of Image_Text (e.g. use "font_path" instead of "fontPath" now) - created new class Image_Graph_Axis_Values for better customization - in the same step deprecated Image_Graph_Axis::setNumbercolor(), Image_Graph_Axis::setNumberformat() and Image_Graph_Axis_X::setLabels() - added much more phpdoc-documentation in source, commited doc to PEAR-manual etc. - fixed php closing-tags - some bugfixes
Note: This release does *not* break BC. However the font-options have changed because of the API-break in Image_Text!

- splitted package into smaller classes to get a more intuitive API - improved API a lot now that it's possible to be more flexible due to improved OO - renamed marker "rhomb" to "diamond" - applied new directory-structure for package (as defined by the core-group) - added workarounds for better results with current Image_Text v0.2
- fixed filenames for the current Image_Text-package - did some minor bugfixes that came up when running with full error_reporting
